alert.note: Alert for Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:27PM EDT until July 21 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Essex County in northern New York... Western Orange County in central Vermont... Southern Addison County in central Vermont... Northern Rutland County in southern Vermont... Northwestern Windsor County in southern Vermont... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 427 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Black Point, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Rutland, Middlebury, Castleton, Sudbury, Killington, Salisbury, Rutland City, Orwell, Rochester, Benson, Chittenden, West Rutland, Whiting, Granville, Goshen, West Castleton, Hancock, Hubbardton, Shoreham and Ripton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
